name: Boom Boat
description:
An unknown menace is lurking at the bottom of the sea. Cold, ruthless and calculating they slowly plan for the world's ultimate destruction. We have only one hope left...

Boom Boat v1.1 Details:
* Tilt controls for movement
* Physics based puzzle gameplay where you blow stuff up, knock objects over and use gravity to your advantage.
* 60 levels with three challenge objectives per level. Can you get all 180 stars?
* Game Center support: 35 Achievements and multiple leaderboards. Additional achievements will be added through free download content in future updates.
* HD Retina Display for iPhone 4

Hardware Requirements:
iPhone 3GS or later, iPod Touch 3G or later, or iPad 1 or later
